title: "go help remote" doc should be updated for recent Bitbucket changes (git support, capitalization of Bitbucket).
body:
There are two Bitbucket-related errors in the "go help remote" text:

1) Incorrect capitalization of "Bitbucket" service name.

The bitbucket.org web site uses the capitalization "Bitbucket", rather than
the "BitBucket" used in the "go help remote" text.

See the "Bitbucket" logo in the upper left hand corner of http://bitbucket.org
for an example.

2) Need to document that Bitbucket.org git repositories are supported as well as
Mercurial repositories.

You can verify this by importing the toy project, which is a Git-based project hosted at
bitbucket.org:

$ go get bitbucket.org/wiffenproof/go-remote-test


I think these bugs could be fixed by changing the text

  BitBucket (Mercurial)

to

  Bitbucket (Git, Mercurial)

in these two files

src/cmd/go/doc.go
src/cmd/go/help.go

And change BitBucket where it appears in

src/cmd/go/vcs.go
